turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Assistant, I want to place a coffee order for Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which Starbucks would you like to place your order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Place the order at the Starbucks on Northern Blvd. in Bayside NY.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, Bayside NY. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order me a Venti Cherry Mocha. no whip cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, venti cherry mocha with no whip cream. What type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, item has been added to the order. Is there anything else you would like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, add a Venti Eggnog Latte as well. Whole milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, adding venti eggnog latte with whole milk to the order. Does that complete your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's all. Please place the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How would you like to pay for the order? Would you like to use the card on file or pay in store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please use the card on file.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, placing the order now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order has been placed and should be ready in approximately 10 minutes. The receipt will be emailed to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else thing I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is all. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good bye.
